data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Brighton.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Sergio Reguilon gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tottenham.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Tottenham.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
Tanguy Ndombele (Tottenham) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 9, Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Tottenham.
Tottenham have been awarded a penalty in London...
In the minute 13, Goal! Tottenham take a 1-0 lead thanks to a Harry Kane spot-kick..
Brighton are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Tottenham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Tottenham.
Graham Scott awards Brighton a goal kick.
Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 18, Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
Tottenham are pushing forward but Heung Min Son's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Brighton goal kick.
Goal kick for Tottenham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Brighton have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Graham Scott awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Brighton.
Tottenham to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In the minute 32, Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Free kick for Brighton in the half of Tottenham.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Tottenham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Brighton push upfield but Graham Scott quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in Tottenham.
In the minute 36, In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Brighton.
Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Graham Scott signals a Tottenham throw-in in Brighton's half.
Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 39, At Tottenham Hotspur Stadium, Sergio Reguilon has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick for Brighton in the half of Tottenham.
Throw-in high up the field for Brighton in London.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Brighton.
Brighton are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Brighton to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
In the minute 44, Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brighton's half?
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Tottenham have a goal kick.
Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Tottenham are in shooting range from this free kick.
Tottenham's Erik Lamela gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 45, Graham Scott awards Brighton a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in London.
Dan Burn (Brighton) gets a yellow card.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Graham Scott awards the home team a throw-in.
Graham Scott signals a Tottenham throw-in in Brighton's half.
Free kick Tottenham.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Tottenham.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Pierre Hojbjerg is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 53, Pierre Hojbjerg returns to the field for Tottenham after picking up a slight injury.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Brighton.
Brighton have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal! Tariq Lamptey equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 56, Pascal Gross instrumental with a fine assist.
Graham Scott awards the away team a throw-in.
Brighton push forward at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium and Leandro Trossard gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Tottenham defence.
In the minute 60, Tottenham needs to be cautious. Brighton have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Tottenham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Tottenham.
In the minute 62, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Brighton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tottenham's half?
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 64, The home team have replaced Tanguy Ndombele with Giovani Lo Celso. This is the first substitution made today by Jose Mourinho.
Solly March, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Bernardo is the substitute for Brighton.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Solly March for Brighton who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Brighton.
Graham Scott signals a Brighton throw-in in Tottenham's half.
Tottenham have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Tottenham's Erik Lamela gets in a shot on goal at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 70, Jose Mourinho (Tottenham) is making a second substitution, with Gareth Bale replacing Erik Lamela.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
Goal! Tottenham take a 2-1 lead through a well-placed header from Gareth Bale.
In the minute 73, Great play from Sergio Reguilon to set up the goal.
Graham Potter is making the team's second substitution at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium with Danny Welbeck replacing Leandro Trossard.
Throw-in for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 76, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Tariq Lamptey.
Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Graham Potter (Brighton) has taken off Tariq Lamptey who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Alexis MacAllister is the replacement.
In the minute 80, Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Brighton to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Tottenham.
Ben Davies is replacing Heung Min Son for the home team.
In London, Adam Webster (Brighton) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 88, Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In London Tottenham attack through Giovani Lo Celso. The finish is off target, however.
Brighton have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Brighton close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Tottenham.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Dan Burn for Brighton is whistled offside.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Tottenham.
Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brighton's half?
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
Throw-in for Brighton at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Tottenham to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Graham Scott signals a Tottenham throw-in in Brighton's half.
That's full-time at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. The final score is 2-1.
